title: Reunion
description: This week Thad and Tom are in town for some undisclosed business and we're joined by Aaron Gold (@AutoNerd).  Aaron and Matt are fresh off the Lexus LC 500 launch in Hawaii, the Tesla Model X is rife with issues, my Fiesta is an electrical mess and the model T proves more reliable than both.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
content:encoded: This week Thad and Tom are in town for some undisclosed business and we're joined by Aaron Gold (@AutoNerd).  Aaron and Matt are fresh off the Lexus LC 500 launch in Hawaii, the Tesla Model X is rife with issues, my Fiesta is an electrical mess and the model T proves more reliable than both.
